title: Grade system is terrible
body:
Hello Everyone

I recently had a game where I was playing {{champion:26}} mid and went 17 2 12 KDA  with 44K damage. Mine was the biggest damage next to assassin Kayn who did 30K.

For this superb stats I only got an A+. How does this even make sense?

It was 33 min long game and I had 169 farm.

Is the grading system only rewards AD's who can afk farm well? You would think solo carrying the game should get you an S- at least.

The 2nd guy who was playing full AD assassin {{champion:141}}  had 210 farm, 14 kills and did 30K damage. He got an S+

If you want a good rank you should afk farm instead of helping your team? If so Riot you really should fix this.

Ah the silent cowards downvoting. At least have the balls to comment why.


I had 5K more gold then anyone else. So that farming >kills logic is bs

All my downvotes are from : Bot mains so far. (Of course you got no problem with farming :P)

replies.body:
You're compared to others on the same champion in the same role, not to teammates. 

Having a great kda is only one part of things, but vision or KP or objective participation or cs are all other factors you you need to do well in every regard compared to your peers for the best grades.
You are telling me most silver players have 20 0 15 KDA on Zilean mid?
Not just silver players being compared on Zilean mid. ALL players are being compared on Zilean mid.

Wasnt it that it only checks with tiers? bronze, silver ,gold , etc

By the way I never see anyone playing Zilean. So it checks with only with Zilean 1 tricks? 

Meh Im sure Riot only cares about farming. My proof is the aram games. Even going 20 0 0 you only get A-  because you did not farm enough.

No, it doesn't care about your rank/mmr, that's just a common assumption people make without actually having looked into it.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/bZL8vAWw-champion-mastery-qa?comment=000f0000

A loose explanation for why it works out is because silver mmr players are playing against silver mmr players, diamond vs diamond and so on, so while silver players may make a lot more mistakes, silver players get punished for those mistakes far less, and it loosely cancels out.

>
> Wasnt it that it only checks with tiers? bronze, silver ,gold , etc

Grades in ARAM wouldn't make any sense if that was the case. Wood 7 players would be getting S ranks just for existing.

They are telling you KDA barely matters for grades. And winning in general. Who gets kills is irrelevant.

> It was 33 min long game and I had 169 farm.

Thatâ€™s pretty bad farm for a 30 minute game.

Also, the system counts your vision score, as well as your damage to turrets and to neutral objectives.
Ive gotten S ranks by tryharding on Sona last season, dont ask me how
170 at 33 minutes is bad.. you need to focus more on farming
